#summary subtotal - adds subtotal lines to a flat-file

= Usage =

`subtotal <options> `



= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
||-V||--version|| ||print version info and exit||
||-v||--verbose|| ||print verbose messages during execution||
||-i||--input||<infile> ||name of input file (stdin if not specified)||
||-d||--delim||<delim> ||input delimiter (ascii 0xfe if not specified)||
||-o||--output||<outfile> ||name of output file (stdout if not specified)||
||-l||--start-line||<start_line> ||the first line of data - everything before it is printed as-is.||
||-k||--key||<key> ||1-based column number for subtotal key||
||-s||--sum||<sum> ||list of 1-based column numbers to be subtotaled||
